title: Chapter 1 – Review
description: Short-answer practice aligned to Chapter 1 outcomes. Keep units in your answers.

easy.question: Each tablet of TYLENOL WITH CODEINE contains 30 mg codeine phosphate and 300 mg acetaminophen. If a patient takes 2 tablets daily for 7 days, how many mg of each?
hints: Multiply per-tablet amount × tablets per day × 7 days.
easy.solution: Codeine: 30 mg × 2 × 7 = 420 mg. Acetaminophen: 300 mg × 2 × 7 = 4200 mg.

easy.question: A cough syrup contains 10 mg dextromethorphan HBr per 5 mL. How many mg are in a 120-mL bottle?
hints: Find mg/mL then multiply by 120 mL.
easy.solution: 10 mg / 5 mL = 2 mg/mL. 2 mg/mL × 120 mL = 240 mg.

easy.question: Filgrastim syringe contains 480 mcg per 0.8 mL. How many mcg are in a 0.5 mL injection?
easy.solution: 480 mcg / 0.8 mL = 600 mcg/mL. 600 mcg/mL × 0.5 mL = 300 mcg.

easy.question: A pediatric vitamin contains 0.25 mg fluoride ion per mL. How many mg are delivered by 0.6 mL?
A pediatric vitamin contains 1500 units of vitamin A per mL. A dropper delivers 20 drops per mL. How many units are delivered in 2 drops?
easy.solution: Volume = 2/20 mL = 0.1 mL. Units = 1500 units/mL × 0.1 mL = 150 units.

easy.question: An ophthalmic solution contains 1 mg/mL dexamethasone phosphate. If the eyedropper delivers 20 drops/mL, how many mg are in 2 drops?

hard.question: An oral solution contains, per mL, 80 mg lopinavir and 20 mg ritonavir. How many mg of each are in a 0.4 mL dose?
Acyclovir suspension contains 200 mg per 5 mL. How many mg are in a pint (473 mL) bottle?
An elixir contains 220 mg ferrous sulfate (FS) per 5 mL. If each mg FS provides 0.2 mg elemental iron, how many mg elemental iron are in 5 mL?
hints: First find mg FS in 5 mL (given), then multiply by 0.2.
hard.solution: 220 mg FS × 0.2 mg Fe/mg FS = 44 mg.

hard.question: A 15-mL nasal spray delivers 20 sprays per mL and 1.5 mg per spray. (a) How many total sprays per bottle? (b) How many mg of drug per bottle?
hints: (a) sprays = volume × sprays/mL. (b) multiply sprays by mg per spray.

hard.question: Penicillin V potassium: each tablet provides 400,000 units. If a patient takes 4 tablets daily for 10 days, how many total units are taken?
